roleset.name: put plaster on something again
roleset.note: REPLASTER-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to plaster.01. (from replaster.01-v)

role.descr: thing put/plastered, plaster or thing serving as plaster itself
where plaster is put, thing getting covered in plaster

example.name: Args 0 & 2, destination as object
example.text: Their clients can find temporary living quarters , buy food , replace lost clothing , repair broken water heaters , and replaster walls .

example.name: Arg 1 object, prepositional arg2
example.text: After a first failed attempt at a marble faux-finish, he replastered posters onto the wall.
example.arg: After a first failed attempt at a marble faux-finish,

example.name: destination as object, arg1 as prepositional
example.text: Back in the dorm, he replastered the walls with tango posters and gave lessons to classmates.
